Description: Kramer Classic Series Pacer 6-String Electric Guitar - Candy Apple Red​ Click images to enlarge Description We Are Unlimited-Goods Kramer Classic Series Pacer 6-String Electric Guitar - Candy Apple Red​ During the shred boom of the mid- 1980s, Kramer was the #1 selling electric guitar brand in the world, and its fast, powerful designs set the pace for countless other makers to follow. Endorsements from no less than Vivian Campbell, Edward Van Halen, Jeff Golub, Brad Gillis, Neil Schon, and Richie Sambora proved that the company was hitting the mark for top-flight professionals. And at the center of it all, the Kramer Pacer was the cornerstone model. Now, the Kramer Pacer Classic embodies the original model from 1983 in a new, contemporary shred machine for the hardest rocking, fastest riffing players out there in the 21st century. The Kramer Pacer Classic features a Mahogany body and a Maple neck with Maple fretboard; a volume control for each pickup; master tone control; three-way mini toggle pickup selector switch; 25.5" scale length; and black hardware. Features: Slim, Wide Profile 2 Volume, 1 Tone Control knob with Miniature Three-way Toggle Pair of Alinco V Humbuckers Floyd Rose Licensed Tremolo Bridge with Locking Nut 22 frets Mahogany Body Maple neck and fingerboard Premium Die-cast Tuners DOES NOT INCLUDE A CASE Included In This Auction: Kramer Classic Series Pacer 6-String Electric Guitar - Candy Apple Red Tremolo Bar Condition: Guitar is in great working and cosmetic condition with some belt buckle scratching on the back, dust, and normal minor scratching on the body from a pick.
